amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to fund the National Grape and Wine Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the National Grape and Wine Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 328 (Roll no. 192).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
